evidence_span: The thermal management system of the CIP works independently of the gravitational environment (ground or microgravity), due to active cooling and proper ventilation present in the system.

section_heading: Description of the Compact Imaging Platform and Its Components
evidence_span: The imaging configuration of the CIP involves dark-field imaging of C. elegans samples by using a fixed-height illumination source and the iPod Touch camera.

section_heading: Description of the Compact Imaging Platform and Its Components
evidence_span: Videos can be acquired at 1080p resolution with a frame rate of 3-30 fps, or time-lapse imaging can be performed with a delay ranging from 1-60 s.The mechanical design of the CIP is simple.

section_heading: Description of the Compact Imaging Platform and Its Components
evidence_span: The thermal management system of the CIP works independently of the gravitational environment (ground or microgravity), due to active cooling and proper ventilation present in the system.

section_heading: Description of the Compact Imaging Platform and Its Components
evidence_span: The imaging configuration of the CIP involves dark-field imaging of C. elegans samples by using a fixed-height illumination source and the iPod Touch camera.

evidence_span: Autofocusing is achieved using a 3rd-party app (FiLMiC Pro, Seattle, WA, USA) on the iPod Touch.

evidence_span:
Videos can be acquired at 1080p resolution with a frame rate of 3-30 fps, or time-lapse imaging can be performed with a delay ranging from 1-60 s.
A smart-device camera such as the iPod Touch was chosen not only because of its ease of use o

section_heading: CONCLUSION
evidence_span: The C. elegans community continues to develop a variety of open-source image analysis tools [61] that could be potentially used to analyze images acquired from the CIP to increase the depth of phenotyping.

section_heading: CONCLUSION
evidence_span: The hardware of CIP as demonstrated here could be further improved.

section_heading: CONCLUSION
evidence_span: In summary, the CIP is a simple, versatile, low-cost and small-footprint phenotyping tool for C. elegans assays, that could be deployed in research and educational settings on Earth in its current form.

section_heading: METHODS
evidence_span: Animals were cultured in 60 mm nematode growth medium (NGM) petri plates with 150-200 µL E. Coli OP50 at 20 • C. Synchronized animals at day 5 from hatching were used in all the assays performed.

section_heading: METHODS
evidence_span: For this paper, the strains used were wild-type Bristol (N2), CB189 unc-32(e189) III., and CB1068 unc-79(e1086) III.

section_heading: Plate assay.
evidence_span: The plates were seeded 12 h prior to animal transfer so that the bacteria lawn was fresh and thin to obtain good quality contrast between animals and background.
